meanings.sent1: The hamulose plant clung to the fence with its tiny hooks.
meanings.sent2: The hamulose fabric snagged on the rough surface.
meanings.sent3: The hamulose cat toy kept getting stuck in the carpet.
meanings.sent4: His hamulose personality made it hard for others to get close to him.
meanings.sent5: The hamulose texture of the Velcro made it perfect for sticking things together.

meanings.definition: Covered in small hooks or barbs.
meanings.sent1: The hamulose surface of the Velcro fastener was perfect for sticking things together.
meanings.sent2: The hamulose skin of the fruit made it difficult to peel.
meanings.sent3: The hamulose brush caught on her sweater as she walked by.
meanings.sent4: The hamulose branches of the tree intertwined like a natural puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The hamulose texture of the cat's tongue helped it groom efficiently.
